141 template <typename T>
142 inline void get_array(
143  size_t n_valid_events,
144  T *array,
145  T **out,
146  int *n_out
147  ){
148  try{
149  *n_out = (int) n_valid_events;
150  (*out) = (T*) malloc(sizeof(T) * n_valid_events);
151  for(size_t i=0; i<n_valid_events; i++) (*out)[i] = array[i];
152  }
153  catch (std::bad_typeid& bt){
154  std::cerr << "bad_typeid caught: " << bt.what() << '\n';
155  }
156 }
157

205  int n_ph_min, int n_ph_max
206 );

209 class TTTRRange {
210 
211 protected:
212  size_t start;
213  size_t stop;
214  unsigned long long start_time;
215  unsigned long long stop_time;
216 
217 public:
218 
219  TTTRRange():
220  start(0),
221  stop(0),
222  start_time(0),
223  stop_time(0)
224  {};
225 
226  virtual std::vector<size_t > get_tttr_indices();
227 
228  std::vector<unsigned long long> get_start_stop(){
229  std::vector<unsigned long long> v = {start, stop};
230  return v;
231  }
232 
233  std::vector<unsigned long long> get_start_stop_time(){
234  std::vector<unsigned long long> v = {start_time, stop_time};
235  return v;
236  }
237 
238  unsigned long long get_duration(){
239  return get_start_stop_time()[1] - get_start_stop_time()[0];
240  }
241 
242 };

260  std::map<std::string, int> container_names = {
261  {std::string("PTU"), 0},
262  {std::string("HT3"), 1},
263  {std::string("SPC-130"), 2},
264  {std::string("SPC-600_256"), 3},
265  {std::string("SPC-600_4096"), 4},
266  {std::string("PHOTON-HDF5"), 5}
267  };
268 
269  typedef bool (*processRecord_t)(
270  uint64_t&, // input
271  uint64_t&, // overflow counter
272  uint64_t&, // true number of sync pulses
273  uint32_t&, // microtime
274  int16_t&, // channel number (16bit more than enough, negative numbers - potential future special cases
275  int16_t& // the event type: photon, or marker (overflows are treated separately and removed during reading)
276  );
277 
278  std::map<int, processRecord_t> processRecord_map = {
279  {PQ_RECORD_TYPE_HHT2v1, ProcessHHT2v1},
280  {PQ_RECORD_TYPE_HHT2v2, ProcessHHT2v2},
281  {PQ_RECORD_TYPE_HHT3v1, ProcessHHT3v1},
282  {PQ_RECORD_TYPE_HHT3v2, ProcessHHT3v2},
283  {PQ_RECORD_TYPE_PHT2, ProcessPHT2},
284  {PQ_RECORD_TYPE_PHT3, ProcessPHT3},
285  {BH_RECORD_TYPE_SPC600_256, ProcessSPC600_256},
286  {BH_RECORD_TYPE_SPC600_4096, ProcessSPC600_4096},
287  {BH_RECORD_TYPE_SPC130, ProcessSPC130}
288  };
289
